abstract: Louisville may be admitted to the Big 12 football conference instead of West Virginia after intense lobbying of Senate minority leader Mitch McConnell, Republican of Kentucky.
snippet: Louisville may be the university that is admitted to the Big 12 instead of West Virginia, with one source saying it is “too close to call.”
lead_paragraph: Louisville may be the university that is admitted to the Big 12 instead of West Virginia, with one source saying it is “too close to call.”

headline.main: Big 12 Might Admit Louisville, Not West Virginia
headline.print_headline: Big 12 Might Admit Louisville, Not West Virginia
headline.seo: Big 12 May Admit Louisville, Not West Virginia
